item.title: Nearly 4000 Killed, Wounded By Suicide Attacks in Mogadishu since 2012
item.description: Last week, Al Shabaab terrorists targeted a bustling street full of restaurants, cafes and shops near Mogadishuâ€™s Maka Al Mukarama Hotel with twin suicide car bombs as residents enjoyed their evening with friends and family. The attack was devastating. Twenty-five people were killed, more than 130 others injured, while dozens of shops, cafeterias, and vehicles were reduced to rubble. According to my analysis of 114 suicide bombings in the capital since 2012, suicide attacks are becoming more frequent, more complex and more lethal.
